description: A request to start an asynchronous job to query a user's download list.  This request must include one or more parts: availableFilesRequest, inlcudeStatistics,

availableFilesRequest.description: Optional. When included, the resulting query results will include a single page of results of files from the user's download list that are currently available for download.

inlcudeStatistics.description: Optional.  When included and set to true, the results will include DownloadListStatistics about the files on the user's download list.
